description.value:
The Fathomless lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

Spell Level Spells
1st @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.PbQvcZ70QhVM8dOy]{Create or Destroy Water}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.SHmTDvXfGItXBTs6]{Thunderwave}
2nd @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.NJoboox7UplFADzn]{Gust of Wind}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.IWxKwBugJfls3V7S]{Silence}
3rd @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.MyWK6N6skPjXybdl]{Lightning Bolt}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.sNfU0BaHmjqml2zk]{Sleet Storm}
4th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.uLXgUtgVTI6Qiyyn]{Control Water}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.fEjWft78oYHZIlqe]{Elemental Weapon}
5th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.xXU6xTv2rGfbUUrN]{Bigby's Hand} (appears as a tentacle), @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.vUFQvX3V7qTqgqFE]{Cone of Cold}

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
